text.section: The advisory committee shall elect a chairperson during the first organizational meeting.
Appointed committee members may be reimbursed for reasonable and necessary expenses incurred while engaged in carrying out the official duties of the committee.
The committee shall be attached to the Department of Agriculture for administrative purposes.

law.history: Amended 2012 Ky. Acts ch. 159, sec. 3, effective July 12, 2012. -- Created 2009 Ky. Acts ch. 24, sec. 5, effective June 25, 2009.

metadata.lrc-note: (7/12/2012). In 2012 Ky. Acts ch. 159, sec. 3, subsection (3)(c)2., "free or reduced meals" has been changed to read, "free or reduced-price meals" in codification. The Reviser of Statutes has corrected this manifest clerical or typographical error under the authority of KRS 7.136(1)(h).
